DOC.brief_summary: This investigator sponsor Investigational Device Exemption ( IDE ) aim assess use Custom Made Device ( CMD ) repair juxtarenal aneurysm , suprarenal type IV thoracoabdominal aneurysm standard risk patient appropriate anatomy . This study prospective , single-center , non-randomized , single-arm study .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Outcomes Radiation Safety After Endovascular Repair Complex Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms Using CMDs
DOC.criteria: A patient deem suitable inclusion study patient least one following : 1 . Juxtarenal suprarenal AAA type IV thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm diameter ≥5.0 cm diameter 2 time normal aortic diameter ; 2 . Aneurysm history growth ≥0.5 cm/year ; 3 . Saccular aneurysm aortic diameter great 1.5 time normal aortic diameter deem risk rupture base upon physician interpretation . 4 . Patients eligible treatment commercially available endografts . General Exclusion Criteria A patient must exclude clinical investigation follow true : 1 . Age < 18 year ; 2 . Life expectancy < 2 year ; 3 . Pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant within 60 month ; 4 . Inability refusal give informed consent patient legally authorized representative ; 5 . Unwilling unable comply followup schedule ; 6 . Prior surgical interventional procedure within 30 day anticipate date fenestrated procedure , exception plan stag procedure provide access repair ( e.g . stag iliac conduit , thoracic endovascular aortic aneurysm repair proximal aneurysm ) , facilitate procedure allow open reparation target artery amenable revascularization investigational device , u internal iliac artery , subclavian artery visceral artery early bifurcation , tortuosity occlusive disease prevent successful placement alignment side stent , treat proximal aortic aneurysm . 7 . Participation another clinical device trial , exception observational study participation another investigational endovascular endograft protocol percutaneous aortic valve protocol , encompass IDE protocol ( > 30 day ) . 8 . Patients rupture aortic aneurysm require urgent emergent repair . Medical Exclusion Criteria Patients must exclude study follow condition true : 1 . Known sensitivity allergy stainless steel , nitinol , polyester , solder ( tin , silver ) , polypropylene , urethane gold 2 . History anaphylactic reaction contrast material adequately pre medicate 3 . Leaking rupture aneurysm associate hypotension 4 . Uncorrectable coagulopathy 5 . Mycotic aneurysm patient evidence active systemic infection . 6 . History connective tissue disorder ( e.g . vascular Ehlers Danlos , Marfan 's syndrome ) , exception patient prior open surgical aortic replacement endovascular repair , surgical graft endograft would serve land zone investigational endograft . 7 . Body habitus would inhibit xray visualization aorta branch . Anatomical Exclusion Criteria Patient must exclude study follow true : 1 . Inadequate femoral iliac access compatible requirement require delivery system . 2 . Type I , II III thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm , exception patient prior open surgical aortic replacement endovascular repair , surgical graft endograft extend proximal near celiac artery ( functional type IV ) would serve land zone investigational endograft . 3 . Inability perform temporary permanent open surgical endovascular iliac conduit patient inadequate femoral/iliac access . 4 . Absence land aortic segment distal thoracic aorta diaphragmatic hiatus : A diameter measure outer outer wall great 38 mm less 19 mm ; Parallel aortic wall > 20 % diameter change significant calcification and/or thrombus select area seal zone . 5 . Visceral anatomy compatible CMD due excessive occlusive disease small size amenable stent graft placement . 6 . Unsuitable distal iliac arterial fixation site anatomy : Common iliac artery fixation site diameter , measure outer wall outer wall section image ( CT ) < 8.0 mm inability perform surgical conduit . Iliac artery diameter , measure outer wall outer wall sectional image ( CT ) > 21 mm distal fixation site , inability perform open internal iliac artery revascularization iliac branch stent graft custom iliac extension fenestration . Iliac artery distal fixation site < 10 mm length . Inability preserve least one hypogastric artery .
